document_data.name: Arthaeuil Nrensam
document_data.mainbody:
High Trident '''Arthaeuil Nrensam''' was a priest of [[Umberlee]] at the temple of [[Onthalasp]] in the [[Nelanther Isles]] in the 10{{th}} and 11{{th}} centuries [[DR]].{{Cite web/The Candlekeep Collection}}

In the [[1016 DR|Year of the Roaring Tempest, 1016 DR]], Arthaeuil wrote an autobiography titled ''[[Words on a Wave]]''. It detailed his life and the customs of the Umberlant faith, such as ''[[The Orglara]]'' and the rites of the [[Green Priests]] at the [[Shell House]] in [[Ilyaport]], [[Lapaliiya]], but it might be considered biased toward his faith.
